ygData.subject: Cleric's and PvP
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone tried healing or buffing a NPC or a MOB. I play a Cleric on Rallos Zek (PvP) and my main rationale is I like to heal. I play a good cleric and
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone tried healing or buffing a NPC or a MOB. I play a Cleric on
Rallos Zek (PvP) and my main rationale is I like to heal. I play a "good"
cleric and have healed bad/good races. My main irritation is when I'm
suddenly PK'd by a member of my own race. (High Elf. I hang my head in shame
at my fallen brothers and sisters)

Anyway normally there is a +/- 4 range for PvP correct? It seems to me that
the Cleric is uniquely positioned so that we can severely inconvenience
other players far below our level. If they are fighting a MOB can we heal
the MOB? Can we buff it? I must admit I have never tried it, I just thought
of it. Has anyone any experience of this??

Regards

Nynenom of Rallos Zek
